note: Initial triage complete. PowerShell command is Base64 encoded. Decoded content shows Invoke-Expression pattern consistent with malware dropper. Correlates with phishing email received earlier. Escalating priority.
C2 traffic confirmed. Beacon pattern matches known Cobalt Strike malleable profile. Host should be isolated immediately. Contacted endpoint team.

Credential dumping confirmed via memory forensics. LSASS was accessed by suspicious process. Three domain admin accounts potentially compromised. Initiating password reset for: admin_svc, backup_admin, sql_service. IR team notified.
Lateral movement confirmed from WIN-WKS-042 to WIN-SRV-DB01. Attacker using compromised admin_svc account. Database server contains PII - escalating to critical incident.
Large data transfer to paste.ee identified. Approximately 5MB uploaded. Content analysis pending - may contain exfiltrated database records. Legal and compliance notified.
Reviewed S3 access logs. Contractor account accessed confidential bucket outside business hours from unusual IP. Account suspended pending investigation. Manager interview scheduled.
